noisepp::TerraceModule

noisepp::TerraceModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseTerrace.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::TerraceModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Maps the output value of the source module onto a terrace-forming curve.
